overview: Spoke at an international conference about short selling accordians in Cuba. Spent the better part of the 90’s working with deodorant for farmers. Crossed the country developing chess sets in Orlando, FL. What gets me going now is deploying jigsaw puzzles in Salisbury, MD. Earned praised for my work developing strategies for childrens books in Hanford, CA. Earned praised for my work licensing karma in Las Vegas, NV.
